Key bowler Kagiso Rabada’s ankle injury has forced him out of the Proteas’ upcoming tour of Ireland, dealing a blow to South Africa ahead of a crucial World Test Championship time.

articles.title: Sanket Sargar to stay back in UK for UCL tear treatment after Commonwealth Games 2022 - SportsCafe
articles.description: Weightlifter Sanket Mahadev Sargar, who won silver in the 55 kg category and became India's first medalist at the Birmingham Commonwealth Games, will remain in the UK for treatment of his UCL injury. It takes at least three months for an Ulnar Collateral Liga…
articles.content: His second effort, however, ended in a terrible elbow injury. Sanket, in an amazing move, went back for a third try, but that just made his injury worse and he was unable to finish the lift. Weightli… [+149 chars]
